title: Hamilton Grange National Memorial: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar          Use the search boxes below to find out what's happening at Hamilton Grange!           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Hamilton Grange National Memorial The National Park Service Turns 100!      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Hamilton Grange National Memorial Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Please come and celebrate by attending an informal ranger talk on some of the highlights of this extremely rich history.
